TextLibrary.Text: You talked to one of the traitors?
You talked to one of the traitors?
Yes, but I'm not sure they are traitors. This one seemed to have a moral objection to something about the MRI.
Yes, but I'm not sure they are traitors. This one seemed to have a moral objection to something about the MRI.
How did they escape from Atlia?
How did they escape from Atlia?
They used a Psionic power to confuse their pursuers. They taught it to me. We can now avoid encounters with small Shuttle Class ships.
They used a Psionic power to confuse their pursuers. They taught it to me. We can now avoid encounters with small Shuttle Class ships.
